questions.question: What is the dominant color of the box's main label?
What is the overall shape of the product packaging?
What appears to be the primary material of the outer packaging?
What color is the majority of the box's outer surface?
Describing the texture, is the box surface glossy or matte?
What language is predominantly used on the box's label?
What kind of graphic element is featured prominently on the label?
What is the general color scheme of the small text on the box?
Is the box's design primarily minimalist or detailed?
Based on the labeling, what is the product's category (e.g., food, cosmetic)?
What is the overall visual impression of the product's packaging?
Does the box appear to have any other visible markings besides text and graphics?
Considering the size, would you classify it as a large or small package?
Does the packaging show any visible seams or closures besides the top flaps?
Is the text on the label primarily in uppercase or lowercase?
